name: CloneSitePage
description:
Clone an existing site page in HubSpot CMS.

This tool is used to clone an existing site page within the HubSpot CMS. It is useful when duplicating pages for updates or creating similar content quickly.

parameters.name: object_id_to_clone
parameters.description: ID of the site page to be cloned in HubSpot CMS.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

parameters.name: clone_name
parameters.description: The desired name for the cloned site page object.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
